name: FROG X BIRD
description: Daring amphibian warriors take flight to prove themselves as TOP FROG OF THE ARENA.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 Processor 3.2GHz or higher Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated GPU (no onboard GPU) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 140 MB available space Sound Card: Onboard Audio Additional Notes: Actual requirements may be LOWER than listed; these are lowest specs tested.
